segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar with such determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so focused, like nothing else matters but those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit surprised by his bravery, climbing up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it could tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's ever fallen before, or if he's always been this daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him seems to be cheering him on, which is a bit surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets the cookies safely, without any accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is still completely oblivious, which is a bit surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to make it, but I'm still a bit on edge watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just full of surprises, one after another.
segments.speaker: PAR
